III. INVESTIGATION
Rule Code & CCI Rule 400.4407 Facility and premises maintenance
Section (1) A facility and premises shall be maintained in a clean,
Description comfortable, and safe condition. The facility shall be located
on land that is properly drained.
Violation Potential Rule or Statute Violation
Type
Allegation It is alleged that the facility has bed bugs and is not doing anything
to remove them.
Investigation I spoke to Complainant 1 on 11/7/23. Complainant 1 reported she
had never went into the until to have seen any bed bugs. No other
new information was provided.
I spoke to Administrator 1 on 11/6/23. Allegations were discussed.
On 11/9/23, I interviewed Youth A face to face at the facility. Youth
A reported that she had never seen bedbugs in her bedroom area.
Youth A reported she was not aware of what bedbugs were. Youth
A reported she had a mark on her arm and thought it was a
bedbug bite. Youth A reported she does not have any marks on
her now to show this consultant.
I observed multiple beds in the unit and did not see any bedbugs.
Documents:
I reviewed A “Rose Pest Solutions” billing statement, dated
10/27/23. The agency completed a bed bug inspection which
stated there was, “No visual sightings of bed bugs at the time of
inspection.” The company documented checking the bedroom
wing, various rooms, common area, and desks associated with
the wing.
Analysis There is no evidence to validate that there are bed bugs at the
facility or that the agency did not investigate the matter.
Conclusion Violation Not Established
2

IV. RECOMMENDATION
Based on investigative findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable
licensing statutes and rules. It is recommended that the current license status be
